text: amikhan jane kun manu bhi niyom laga kaam kori kene nijorke bhal kori bole napare kintu khali Jisu Khrista logote biswas thakile he pare. Niom mani kene nohoi kintu Jisu Khrista logote biswas kori kene amikhan bhal hobole paribo. Kelemane niyom laga kaam pora amikhan laga gaw to bhal kori bole napare2.16 Rom. 3:20-22; Phili. 3:9.
